org.openscience.cdk.interfaces
Interface IChemFile

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, IChemObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
ChemFile, DebugChemFile, NNChemFile
public interface IChemFile
extends IChemObject

An IChemObject containing a number of ChemSequences. This is supposed to be the top level container, which can contain all the concepts stored in a chemical document

Author:
egonw
Belongs to CDK module:
interfaces
